name: Workday Open Frame
tagline: Providing modern browser capabilities to older versions of Microsoft Internet Explorer (IE 6.x, 7.x and 8.x)
body:
## Workday Open Frame
***
Workday Open Frame is an open-source add-on to [Microsoft Internet Explorer](http://ie.microsoft.com) that allows for modern web technologies (HTML5 and CSS3) to work within older versions of the browser (IE 6.x, 7.x, and 8.x). This add-on renders specific websites using the open-source [Chromium](http://www.chromium.org/Home) browser which supports modern web technologies instead of the older IE rendering engine.

At Workday, we are committed to building cloud applications that go beyond the limits of traditional enterprise software. In order to achieve our goal of providing unparalleled levels of user experience within our applications, we make use of the new capabilities available only in modern browsers and this add-on allow for our customers who remain on older IE browser versions to experience all of the new Workday features and functionality.

This project is backed by [Workday](http://www.workday.com) and will be supported through August 2015.

![Workday Open Frame](http://www.chromium.org/_/rsrc/1220197576998/Home/flying_browser.png)
